lead_paragraph: ZELMAN--Martin, was born on April 10, 1928 in Breslau, Germany. He and his family escaped the Holocaust, arriving in New York City in 1939. He met the love of his life, Florence, when they were teenagers and soon after married, having three children. Martin was a successful entrepreneur, starting a real estate development business. He was very philanthropic and known by all as a man of great character and integrity. Martin is survived by his three children: Pamela Zelman Sonnenblick (Robert Sonnenblick), Robert Zelman (Jennifer Zelman), and Lisa Zelman Held (Michael Held). He was adored by his nine grandchildren: Alexandra, Cary, Sam, Savannah, Sophia, Jared, Carleigh, Max, and Brigitte. He also leaves behind his sister Ceil Elkin and brother Donald Zelman. The family would like to give thanks to his devoted aides, Giovanna and Carlos and to Hospice for their exceptional care. May his memory be a blessing. 1/3
